description: According to what others have told you or to your own awareness, how often do you snore?
domain: 1=never or rarely - only once or a few times ever, 2=sometimes - a few night per month; under special circumstances, 3= at least once a week, but pattern may be irregular, 4=several (3 to 5) nights per week, 5=every night or almost every night, 9=do not know
